questions.subject: PHYSICS
questions.questionText: A vessel with square cross-section and height of 6 m is vertically partitioned. A small window of 100 cm² with hinged door is fitted at a depth of 3 m in the partition wall. One part of the vessel is filled completely with water and the other side is filled with the liquid having density 1.5 × 10³ kg/m³. What force one needs to apply on the hinged door so that it does not get opened? (Acceleration due to gravity = 10 m/s²)

questions.subject: PHYSICS
questions.questionText: A steel wire of length 2 m and Young's modulus 2.0 × 10¹¹ Nm⁻² is stretched by a force. If Poisson ratio and transverse strain for the wire are 0.2 and 10⁻³ respectively, then the elastic potential energy density of the wire is __________ × 10⁵ (in SI units)

questions.subject: PHYSICS
questions.questionText: If the measured angular separation between the second minimum to the left of the central maximum and the third minimum to the right of the central maximum is 30° in a single slit diffraction pattern recorded using 628 nm light, then the width of the slit is _________ μm.

questions.subject: PHYSICS
questions.questionText: γA is the specific heat ratio of monoatomic gas A having 3 translational degrees of freedom. γB is the specific heat ratio of polyatomic gas B having 3 translational, 3 rotational degrees of freedom and 1 vibrational mode. If γA/γB = (1 + 1/n), then the value of n is________.
questions.concept: Degrees of freedom and specific heat ratio

questions.subject: PHYSICS
questions.questionText: A person travelling on a straight line moves with a uniform velocity v₁ for a distance x and with a uniform velocity v₂ for the next x/3 distance. The average velocity in this motion is 50/7 m/s. If v₁ is 5 m/s then v₂ = _____ m/s.

questions.subject: MATHEMATICS
questions.questionText: Let [•] denote the greatest integer function. If ∫₀³ᵉ dx/(eˣ-1) = α - log_e 3, then [α] is equal to

questions.subject: MATHEMATICS
questions.questionText: Let f: R → R be a thrice differentiable odd function satisfying f''(x) ≥ 0, f'(x) = f(x), f(0) = 0, f'(0) = 3. Then 9f(log_e 3) is equal to _______.

questions.subject: MATHEMATICS
questions.questionText: The absolute difference between the squares of the radii of the two circles passing through the point (-9,4) and touching the lines x+y = 3 and x-y = 3, is equal to _______.
